content: honeycomb scarf created by lisa overby this squishy scarf was created using just 2 skeins of malabrigo rios scarf is knit from tip to tip one half you increase and the second half you decrease the honeycomb brioche makes the fabric delightful to wrap around your neck and the i-cord edge finishes the scarf nicely ©2022 yarn twisters 1 honeycomb scarf materials & info abbreviations yarn 2 skeins malabrigo rios 210 yards/100 g 100% brk - brioche knit knit the slipped st and its yarnover superwash merino wool sample knit in colourway shawl together as one st diana co - cast on gauge 19 sts by 24 row equals 4 by 4 in pattern k - knit after blocking kfb - knit into the front of the stitch leaving on the needles 5 mm us 8 or size needed to obtain gauge left hand needle knit into the back of the same stitch notions stitch marker optional darning needle dropping the stitch off the left hand needle 1 stitch increased finished size centre depth 12 30 5cm wingspan 84 214cm k2tog - knit 2 together insert needle into the next 2 sts knit the 2 sts together as one 1 st decreased notes k3tog - knit 3 together insert needle into the next 3 try to work your i-cord edge sts loosely to avoid a sts knit the 3 sts together as one 2 sts decreased border that is too tight rs - right side stitch marker is optional at the beginning to mark the right side of the scarf sl - slip st purlwise increases and decreases are made every 6th row sl1yo - slip one yarn over bring yarn to front of work if it is not already there slip st purlwise wrap a link to video tutorial of the honeycomb brioche st yarnover around the slipped st https //www youtube com/watch v=vwzuciakiyq st/sts - stitch/stitches block scarf with the rs facing down in order to make ws - wrong side it easier to pin the edges wyif - with yarn in front ©2022 yarn twisters 2 honeycomb scarf pattern instructions decrease section co 6 sts row 1 rs k2 k2tog *k1 brk* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 wyif 1 st decreased set up row 2 ws k3 *k1 sl1yo* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 row 1 rs k2 kfb sl3 wyif 7 sts wyif row 2 ws k2 kfb k1 sl3 wyif 8 sts row 3 k3 *brk k1* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 3 k2 kfb k2 sl3 wyif 9 sts row 4 k3 *sl1yo k1* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 4 k3 sl1yo k1 sl1yo sl3 wyif row 5 k3 *k1 brk* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 5 k3 brk k1 brk sl3 wyif row 6 k3 *k1 sl1 yo* repeat ** to last 3 sts sl3 wyif row 6 k4 sl1yo k1 sl3 wyif row 7 k2 k2tog
